article.title: DRC Awarded STOC II Training and Simulation Contract From the Army
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Dynamics Research Corporation (DRC) has been awarded a prime contract under the U.S. Army Program Executive Office Simulation, Training and Instrumentation Omnibus Contract, known as STOC II. Under the terms of the contract, DRC will develop and support simulation and training systems to train U.S. soldiers with critical warfighting skills.
